reviews.review: well i put a good bit of time into this game and i can say that its pretty good. its hard to get into at first but its fun and addictive once you get into it

A timeless and fun game you always can revisit i have played this game on and off for years and it is still super funny and exciting when you get a good streak. I can whole heartedly reccomend this game if you get bored of one way of playing switch it up with some maps that are user created :).
